programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5354
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep114
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1052
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep17
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep867868
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep689
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep465
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1011
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Cat Vs Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jiens position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Bloody Parrot
programme.desc: A swordsman is suspected of being the thief of a treasure sent to Emperor. Through his investigation, he is led on to the trail of the supernatural Bloody Parrot. Poisonous things happen including a demonic possession, witches casting poison spells and disgusting autopsies. Then a dead constable turns into a vampire!

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Young Avenger
programme.desc: Liu seeks out Li to avenge his brothers death and loses an arm in the fight, vowing revenge ten years later. Li dies after asking his sister to send his daughter Bao Zhu to learn the Dragon Sword skill to avenge his death. Bao Zhu grows up to become a skilled swordswoman and meets Liu for the planned duel with her cousin Chen. Can she defeat Liu?

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Raw Courage
programme.desc: After the Ming Emperor is overthrown and his infant son was put in the care of the Black Dragon Society, a traitorous martial arts clan attacks the society, forcing an inexperienced pair of swordsman and swordswoman to flee with the infant. Their journey to deliver the infant to safety is filled with dangers that would require help from other allies

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Rivals Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, and Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.desc: Tweety's large and in charge as he takes the throne in this zany new full-length movie. When the queen of an island paradise disappears, Tweety unexpectedly becomes next in line for the crown. His Little Highness' entourage includes motorbike daredevil Granny and sly Sylvester, whose allegiance is tested when he uncovers a sinister plot to eliminate Tweety for good! Feathers and fur will fly in this hilarious story that proves royalty - and loyalty - can come in many shapes and sizes.

programme.desc: Robin's Reckoning Part 2 - Despite Batman's orders not to, Robin pursues Tony Zucco, the criminal who was responsible for the death of Robin's parents.

programme.title: Batman: The Animated Series S1 Ep54
programme.desc: Blind As A Bat - Bruce Wayne is temporarily blinded when the Penguin steals a new police helicopter with weaponry developed by WayneTech.

programme.title: Batman: The Animated Series S1 Ep55

programme.title: Batman: The Animated Series S1 Ep56
programme.desc: See No Evil - After a fortune disappears from a gem exposition, Batman investigates. He discovers that the crime may have been committed by an invisible man, an ex-con named Lloyd Ventris.

programme.title: Batman: The Animated Series S1 Ep57
programme.desc: The Demon's Quest Part 1 - When Robin is mysteriously abducted, Batman's search leads him to meet Ra's Al Ghul, leader of The Society of Shadows, whose daughter, Talia, has also been kidnapped.

programme.title: Batman: The Animated Series S1 Ep58
programme.desc: The Demon's Quest Part 2 - Batman discovers Ra's Al Ghul's plan to flood Earth with chemicals and return it to a lush, green planet - which will destroy all life that now exists!

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Truth And Justice
programme.desc: Young Andres settles in a new farm. With rose-tinted lenses, he sets out to transform the farm into a prosperous paradise all he needs is a healthy harvest, cooperative neighbours and a male heir. But, life turns out to be cruel and treacherous.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didnt die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Birth Of A Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Gnther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling theyve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Girl Who Loved To Laugh
programme.desc: Marie Husler, the girl with Down syndrome, mysteriously disappeared before her 18th birthday. 15 years later, her wax corpse is found in Lake Constance, weighed down with iron chains, and two commissioners are called upon to investigate the mystery.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata

programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.desc: Ross becomes nervous when his new girlfriend, Mona, wants to mail cute Christmas cards.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: Aquaman (2018)
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Aquaman, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 2
programme.desc: As the stakes with Lex are higher than ever before, Lena must decide how far she is willing to go to stop her brother. Meanwhile, Alex is brought to her breaking point.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 3
programme.desc: While Lena and Lex battle for control of Luthor Corp, Supergirl makes a new ally.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 4
programme.desc: Supergirl discovers a way to escape from the Phantom Zone, but it comes with some dangerous strings attached. Meanwhile, Lena joins the team on a mission, but has second thoughts.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 5
programme.desc: Nia and Brainy attempt to save Supergirl from the Phantom Zone by time traveling back to Kara's home in 2009. Brainy is worried about keeping a low profile so as not to alter the future timeline.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 14
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr ham it up behind the counter of a famous NYC deli, and head to Union Square where they break the ice with bizarre behavior while selling popsicles. And tonight's loser wishes Bingo wasn't his name-o in a humiliating and cringe-worthy punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 15
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 01
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiance, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 6
programme.desc: At a sporting goods store, a confused customer debates the laws of physics with Michael after he suddenly makes a lightweight box impossibly heavy. Then as a barista, Michael shows caf patrons that glass is not nearly as impenetrable as it seems. Plus, he spooks museum workers when he shows that boomerangs really do always come back, and that taxidermy is a less than permanent solution.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 7
programme.desc: In a Mexican restaurant, Michael treats incredulous diners to a good luck serpent with their tableside guacamole, and makes salsa so spicy it melts metal. Then, he confuses office coworkers with a never-ending brown bag lunch and a frozen meal thatturns out to be alarmingly fresh. Plus, he confounds his new assistant with some tricks of the trade as a real estate agent, including freshening dead flowers right before her eyes.

programme.title: The Flash S9 5
programme.desc: As the Red Death wreaks havoc on Central City, Barry and Iris come up with a plan and turn to Cecile for help. Barry is faced with his greatest mistake.

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.desc: Picking up immediately after the events in Resident Evil: Retribution, Alice (Milla Jovovich) is the only survivor of what was meant to be humanitys final stand against the undead.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Angels Belong In Heaven - Thomas Norton, about to be killed, leaves an urgent recorded message for Charlie: Someone is out to destroy one of the Angels. Lab man Jarvis traces the call to Los Angeles Airport.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Promotion Commotion - Hawkeye, B.J. and Charles are given the assignment of deciding the promotions of the enlisted men and immediately have to fend of pleas and bribes. Charles is even threatened with violence by an ambitious Corporal Hitalski. When Klinger is promoted to Sergeant he sets up Hitalskis arrest. Later Potter befriends a soldier who is ostracized for sticking to his moral code of ethics.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Break-Up, Part II - Three days have passed after the Jeffersons and the Willises have broken up, and George is the only one who's happy about the situation.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep25
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows (Part 2) - Senator Gary Hart makes a cameo appearance at Cheers, while Sam's relationship with Councilwoman Janet Eldridge heats up. Janet convinces Sam to fire Diane and break all ties with his past.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Soul Survivor - In an attempt to save her boss' soul, Paige goes behind her sisters backs and makes a deal with a demon. Meanwhile, Piper learns that Wyatt has been sabotaging her dates.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Angels In The Stretch - A gambler is suspicious of the antics of a rather dull racehorse. The man goes into the colt's stable to investigate but was murdered. His daughter goes to Charlie Townsend and hires the Angels to find the murderer.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Angels On Vacation - Kris invites Bosley and the Angels to vacation in a small Arizona town where her aunt is Mayor and her uncle is Sheriff. Upon their arrival, there are hints that they should leave for fear of danger.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Heroes - The 4077th becomes a media circus when the middle-weight boxing champ has a stroke while at the M*A*S*H unit on a publicity junket. Hawkeye becomes the center of the media pummeling when the boxer dies while under his care. Meanwhile, B.J. invents a new medical electroshock technique while trying to save the life of a patient. The patient lives but the press ignores the story in favor of the weightier news of the death of the champ.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep20
programme.desc: Annihilated - The investigation of a bride-to-be's murder uncovers a man's secret life; a turn in the case rattles Stabler and pushes him to face new truths about his own family.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Break-Up, Part II - Three days have passed after the Jeffersons and the Willises have broken up, and George is the only one who's happy about the situation.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Pray Love Remember - A circular mark in mud and a large footprint are the only clues for McGarrett when a lovers quarrel has a fatal ending. John Hayes, a burly athletic-type student, is suspected of the homicide when all evidence points to him.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep15
programme.desc: A Gazebo Never Forgets - Samantha tells Aunt Clara she plans to get a bank loan in order to tear down the gazebo and build a rumpus room. At the park, Tabitha fancies another baby's toy elephant and twitches it over.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep15
programme.desc: You Can't Tell A Crook By His Cover - After Frasier claims he can spot a criminal in a crowd, Martin challenges him to identify the ex-con in his poker group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep21
programme.desc: Pretend - A teenage boy killed in what appears to be a play fight is a victim of a not so innocent crime. The victim's best friend turns up at the squad room with a video and claims he filmed the death.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Florence's Problem - Florence shows out-of-character actions one day, including cleaning the Jeffersons' entire apartment without griping and giving Louise a prized possession of hers.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep26
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows (Part 3) - After a humiliating press conference for Councilwoman Janet Eldridge, at which Sam physically threw Diane out the door, Janet demands that Sam make a definite commitment - marriage.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep08
programme.desc: Sword and the City - The Charmed Ones are called upon by The Lady of the Lake to help protect Excalibur, the legendary Sword in the Stone.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Angels In Springtime - Actress Eve Le Deus is electrocuted in her hydro-massage tank. Eve's niece, Eve Perkins hires Bosley and the Angels to find the murderer and a missing manuscript in her aunt's possession at the time.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Winning Is For Losers - Linda is determined to win the first prize money in a golf tournament. Her opponent is veteran golfer Donna Dawson who got shot and the Angels and Bosley are brought in to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Haunted Angels - In hopes of contacting her nephew who passed away in an accident, Claire sponsors Dr. Douglas Holden and his psychic research. Bosley brings in the Angels as fake psychics to check on possible fraud.

programme.title: The Master Blackmailer - Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: Part I - Sherlock Holmes adopts an astonishing campaign to thwart one of London's most evil men. The man is more repulsive than any murderer. He is as slithery and venomous as snakes in the zoo.

programme.title: The Master Blackmailer - Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: Part II - Sherlock Holmes adopts an astonishing campaign to thwart one of London's most evil men. The man is more repulsive than any murderer. He is as slithery and venomous as snakes in the zoo.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Pom Pom Angels - One by one, three cheerleaders disappear and the Angels are brought in to find them. Bosley informs the girls that a note from a religious fanatic was sent to each of the girls prior to her disappearance.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep09
programme.desc: Angels Ahoy - A young woman is murdered after she identifies an escaped murderer aboard the luxury liner. Bosley and the Angels infiltrate the ship and discover the ring that's helping criminals to escape the country.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep22
programme.desc: Diane Chambers Day - Diane is sinking into depression because she feels she is being excluded from the bar's "clique," so Frasier creates a plan to cheer her up.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep23
programme.desc: Relief Bartender - Woody fears for his job when Sam hires a temporary bartender who wins the customers' hearts as he puts on a delightful show with every drink he pours.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Death Becomes Him - When a seemingly healthy colleague dies unexpectedly, Frasier becomes obsessed with his own mortality.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Miracle On Third Or Fourth Street - When his son cannot spend the holidays with him, a melancholy Frasier learns the true spirit of Christmas from a group of strangers.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Guess Who's Coming To Breakfast? - Martin is furious with Frasier when he spills the secrets of his fathers love life on the air.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Can't Buy Me Love - Frasier looks forward to a hot date with a beautiful model who bought him in a celebrity bachelor auction.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep15
programme.desc: You Can't Tell A Crook By His Cover - After Frasier claims he can spot a criminal in a crowd, Martin challenges him to identify the ex-con in his poker group.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep08
programme.desc: No Blue Skies - Joey Rand turns to crime when he finds his singing career provides insufficient funds to pay his gambling debts. This leads McGarrett to a chase up and down the sheer walls of a hotel as the nightclub singer turned cat-burglar schemes to rob the rooms of wealthy guests at the hotel.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep09
programme.desc: By the Numbers - Steve McGarrett and his special investigative team are called in when a winning ticket in a numbers game turns out to be a loser and a young Army corporal is accused of a crime. McGarrett and his force must crack the numbers game and bring justice to bear on the racketeers before an entire Army division.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep15
programme.desc: The Tooth Shall Set You Free - Major Weems comes to the 4077th, and at first his concern for his wounded black soldiers seems genuine; on further examination it becomes apparent that the Major is in fact highly prejudiced, to the point of trying to eliminate blacks from his unit by transferring them or assigning them to the front lines. When Potter, Hawkeye and B.J. learn the truth they trick Weems into resigning his position with the aid of a black fellow officer named Rockingham, who impersonates a personnel officer. Rockingham is in truth a dentist and extracts the aching tooth that Charles has been dreading to have out.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep16
programme.desc: Pressure Points - Potter calls on psychiatrist Sydney Freedman after Hawkeye must reopen one of Potters patients because Potter failed to remove all of the shrapnel. It seems the Senior Surgeon is fearing he may be losing his surgical abilities. Charles frustration with Hawkeye and B.J.s slovenly ways leads to a Swamp-thrashing argument. Potter regains his confidence after a few soul-searching sessions with Freedman.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep17
programme.desc: Where There's a Will, There's a War - B.J. goes to Seoul for a haircut and Hawkeye is sent to the front lines in his place. The fighting is so close that Hawkeye decides to write out his last will and testament. Hawkeye reminisces on the past as he names his beneficiaries at the M*A*S*H unit. Meanwhile at the 4077th, the unit has gotten word that a doctor has been killed at the front and they fear that it might be Hawkeye. The truth turns out to be that Hawkeye was actually replacing the dead surgeon and everyone is relieved to hear Hawkeye is safe.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep04
programme.desc: The Power of Three Blondes - When three evil sisters magically steal the Charmed Ones' identities and powers, Piper, Phoebe and Paige must convince Chris that they are the real Charmed Ones in order to get their lives back.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep05
programme.desc: Love's a Witch - Paige meets an attractive male witch and wants to help end the magical feud between his and another magical family. After she refuses Piper and Phoebe's help, she winds up possessed.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep06
programme.desc: My Three Witches - The Halliwell sisters attempt to escape magical alternate realities where their secret desires come true, after Chris uses the demon Gith to try to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Oedipus Hex - Samantha agrees to serve on a fund raising committee. Later, she tells Endora she wishes Darrin would forget about business now and then. Endora flicks her fingers and a bowl of popcorn appears.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Sam's Spooky Chair - Shopping for antiques, Samantha is intrigued by an old chair which moves about to catch her attention. She buys the chair end goes home to prepare dinner for the Tates.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep13
programme.desc: My Friend Ben - Finding Samantha struggling to repair a lamp, Aunt Clara uses her uncertain powers of magic to summon an electrician. Benjamin Franklin, in l8th century clothes, appears.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Samantha for the Defense - Samantha tells how Aunt Clara, trying to summon an electrician, produces Ben Franklin. Ben is arrested for stealing a fire engine. Aunt Clara makes Ben disappear just after Darrin puts up a thousand dollars bail for him.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep15
programme.desc: A Gazebo Never Forgets - Samantha tells Aunt Clara she plans to get a bank loan in order to tear down the gazebo and build a rumpus room. At the park, Tabitha fancies another baby's toy elephant and twitches it over.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep17
programme.desc: Sin - A male sex worker is murdered, and the investigation reveals that a pastor who preaches extreme intolerance toward homosexuals may have had a relationship with him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Responsible - Stabler and Benson investigate a death case leading to high school binge parties and a mother who not only supplies booze to her daughter's friends but sleeps with one of those friends as well.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Lunch With Mama - Mother Jefferson expects George to take her to their monthly lunch date, to the dismay of Louise because she wants George to accompany her to a family friend's funeral on the same day.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep15
programme.desc: George vs. Wall Street - When George finds out that Lionel turned down a well-paying engineering job, he hits the roof. The resulting late-night argument expands to Tom and Helen Willis' apartment upstairs.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Break-Up, Part I - While the Willises and Louise thinks that is a bad idea to engage a writer to write Lionel's term paper, Lionel likes it, and this results in an argument between the two families and soon a break-up.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Break-Up, Part II - Three days have passed after the Jeffersons and the Willises have broken up, and George is the only one who's happy about the situation.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Florence's Problem - Florence shows out-of-character actions one day, including cleaning the Jeffersons' entire apartment without griping and giving Louise a prized possession of hers.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mother Angel - Samantha breaks into the greenhouse of her aunt's ex-lover Victor to feed hamburger to his Venus FlyTrap but chances on a murder. Young Sam goes to the Angels for help.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Angel On My Mind - Bosley and the Angels are in a restaurant and Sabrina sees a man rob and murder the owner of the restaurant. The murderer tries to run Sabrina down; she falls, hitting her head on concrete.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Angels Belong In Heaven - Thomas Norton, about to be killed, leaves an urgent recorded message for Charlie: Someone is out to destroy one of the Angels. Lab man Jarvis traces the call to Los Angeles Airport.

programme.title: The Last Vampyre - Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: Part I - Sherlock Holmes and Watson encounter the case of 'THE LAST VAMPYRE' dramatised from Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's story 'The Adventure of the Sussex Vampire'.

programme.title: The Last Vampyre - Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: Part II - Sherlock Holmes and Watson encounter the case of 'THE LAST VAMPYRE' dramatised from Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's story 'The Adventure of the Sussex Vampire'.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Angels In The Stretch - A gambler is suspicious of the antics of a rather dull racehorse. The man goes into the colt's stable to investigate but was murdered. His daughter goes to Charlie Townsend and hires the Angels to find the murderer.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Angels On Vacation - Kris invites Bosley and the Angels to vacation in a small Arizona town where her aunt is Mayor and her uncle is Sheriff. Upon their arrival, there are hints that they should leave for fear of danger.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep24
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows (Part 1) - Sam takes a sudden interest in politics when a lady hes dating, Janet Eldridge, runs for city council. Diane decides to support her competitor because she fears that if Janet wins, she will also win Sam.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep25
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows (Part 2) - Senator Gary Hart makes a cameo appearance at Cheers, while Sam's relationship with Councilwoman Janet Eldridge heats up. Janet convinces Sam to fire Diane and break all ties with his past.

While doctors continue their fight to save McGarrett's life, the Five-O staff methodically and painstakingly go over his near and far past.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Deathwatch - McGarrett and his Five-O unit fight to save the life of a gangster they despise so he can testify against his former boss.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Pray Love Remember - A circular mark in mud and a large footprint are the only clues for McGarrett when a lovers quarrel has a fatal ending. John Hayes, a burly athletic-type student, is suspected of the homicide when all evidence points to him.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Promotion Commotion - Hawkeye, B.J. and Charles are given the assignment of deciding the promotions of the enlisted men and immediately have to fend of pleas and bribes. Charles is even threatened with violence by an ambitious Corporal Hitalski. When Klinger is promoted to Sergeant he sets up Hitalskis arrest. Later Potter befriends a soldier who is ostracized for sticking to his moral code of ethics.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Heroes - The 4077th becomes a media circus when the middle-weight boxing champ has a stroke while at the M*A*S*H unit on a publicity junket. Hawkeye becomes the center of the media pummeling when the boxer dies while under his care. Meanwhile, B.J. invents a new medical electroshock technique while trying to save the life of a patient. The patient lives but the press ignores the story in favor of the weightier news of the death of the champ.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Soul Survivor - In an attempt to save her boss' soul, Paige goes behind her sisters backs and makes a deal with a demon. Meanwhile, Piper learns that Wyatt has been sabotaging her dates.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep1
programme.desc: Blood In The Water - As the NCIS team searches for Gibbs after wreckage from his boat is discovered, they find out he was tracking a serial killer with journalist Marcie Warren (Pam Dawber), who wrote an expos on him

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep2
programme.desc: Nearly Departed - While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep3
programme.desc: Road To Nowhere - Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killers victims. Also, Agent Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Wide Open - Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep5
programme.desc: Face The Strange - The NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy commander whose body suddenly explodes before Jimmy can examine it

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep6
programme.desc: False Start - NCIS investigates the death of a beloved Navy commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep7
programme.desc: Docked - NCIS investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ships sauna by none other than McGees mother-in-law, Judy (Patricia Richardson)

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep8
programme.desc: Peacekeeper - NCIS investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range. Also, Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep9
programme.desc: Collective Memory - When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot at a naval station, NCIS investigates the case by interviewing the victims three-dimensional hologram of herself, which she created before her death.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep10
programme.desc: Pledge Of Allegiance - NCIS is called in when Navy Chief Warrant Officer Rafi Nazar (Artur Zai Benson) is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep11
programme.desc: All Hands - After a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic picks up a small boat of wounded Navy officers, NCIS arrives on the ship and is forced to hide after discovering terrorists on board. Also, Agent Knight takes a paper doll with her on the mission to capture photos for her nieces grade school class.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep12
programme.desc: Fight Or Flight - When the body of a Navy lieutenant is discovered missing an eye, the NCIS investigation leads to the world of cage fighting.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep13
programme.desc: The Helpers - While investigating the death of an intruder at Quantico, Jimmy and Kasie are exposed to a deadly biotoxin, and the NCIS team calls on Doctor Carol Wilson (Meredith Eaton) for help as they race to find the antidote. Also, Torres tries to distract Jimmys daughter, who came to the office to spend the day with her dad.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep14
programme.desc: First Steps - As NCIS investigates the cause of death of a reservist Navy Seal surgeon, theyre forced to bring Vances daughter, Kayla (Naomi Grace), who recently trained with NCIS, to help with a highly dangerous mission.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep15
programme.desc: Thick As Thieves - Parkers delinquent past resurfaces when NCIS is called to Philadelphia to investigate the death of a Navy petty officer

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep16
programme.desc: The Wake - A gruesome mishap at a Navy petty officers gender-reveal party leads NCIS to the case of a missing teacher that was popularized on a true crime podcast.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep17
programme.desc: Starting Over - NCIS investigates the apparent suicide of a retired Navy officer who was in Palmer and Knights grief group. Also, Torres gets a call from NCIS Special Agent Jane Tennant to come to Hawaii when she gets a lead on a witness from a case they worked on together.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep18
programme.desc: Last Dance - When an infamous arms dealer, Reymundo Dia, is released from prison and bodies start piling up, Torres is forced to face the repercussions of his actions during an undercover operation he worked on years ago.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep19
programme.desc: The Brat Pack - NCIS investigates a ring of clever teenage partygoers when a string of break-ins takes place at Marine Base Quantico. While working the case, Special Agent McGee forms a bond with one of the teens, Teagan Fields.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep20
programme.desc: All Or Nothing - NCIS investigates the unexpected death of a Navy reservist who was an investigative journalist. Also, Knight and Jimmys budding romance is put on hold when a vital organ transfer goes fatally wrong.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep21
programme.desc: Birds Of A Feather - When Agent Parker is framed for murder, the team puts their jobs and lives on the line in order to buy time and uncover the truth, on the 19th season finale.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the legendary swashbuckling hero of Englands Sherwood Forest who defends the poor and battles Alan Rickmans deliciously evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: An Imperfect Murder
programme.desc: An actress's nightmare about killing her ex-boyfriend somehow becomes a reality.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: A veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Mystery thriller starring Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson. Four talented magicians are plucked from obscurity to becomes the Four Horsemen - a group of stage illusionists who soon attract the attention of the FBI...is it magic, or crime?

programme.title: Peter Five Eight
programme.desc: Sam, a seemingly poised and glamorous real estate agent in a small mountain community is revealed to be an unhinged and troubled alcoholic with a dark secret, when a charismatic man in a black sedan named Peter shows up in town one day

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sisters place in the games.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sisters place in the games.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers marooned at a desolate motel begin to die one by one.

programme.title: An Imperfect Murder
programme.desc: An actress's nightmare about killing her ex-boyfriend somehow becomes a reality.

programme.title: The Hunger Games

programme.title: Phantom Racer
programme.desc: 17 years ago, Sawyer caused the death of McCullough. When Sawyer becomes the prime suspect in a series of murders, he realizes his ex-girlfriend and her daughter are also in danger.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: The Green Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Worlds - Journey with Sir David Attenborough into the magical hidden world of plants.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Curry - Gregg Wallace explores the Nottinghamshire factory that produces 250,000 jars of curry sauce each day. Cherry Healey helps harvest chillies.

programme.title: Brian Cox's Adventures in Space and Time S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What is Time? - Brian explores a simple question: what is time? Modern science shows it to be far stranger than we think. He explores Chankillo, the oldest and best-preserved astronomical observatory in the Americas.

programme.desc: The Mysterious North - In the jungles of Thailand's mysterious north, Phayre's leaf monkeys eat the leaves of around a hundred different types of plant.

programme.desc: Commuters - This episode explores whether the secret to an animal's success in is to keep one foot in the wild and one in the city, becoming a wild commuter. They must overcome the unique challenges the urban world throws at them to benefit from the opportunities on offer.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The teams head for the fourth checkpoint, the remote outpost of Churchill, on Hudson Bay. The only transport is a twice-weekly train, and they have just three days to catch it.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Changing Planet S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Six presenters chart the fight to save the planet's endangered ecosystems. Gordon Buchanan returns to Brazil, Ella Al-Shamahi to Cambodia and Ade Adepitan to Kenya.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough and a cast of world leading scientists bring us the facts behind the current extinction crisis. Revealing what extinction is, what is happening now, why it is happening and what could happen in the future.

programme.title: Climate Change - The Facts
programme.desc: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Weighs and Means - Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bimini Sharklab - Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Agile - Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Hummingbirds Quest - From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
