programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dune Kingdoms - Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cape Fur Seals - On South Africas west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, its a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mafia Island - Uncharted Paradise - Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Handle with Care - Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep3
programme.desc: King Kasper - Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dune Kingdoms - Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cape Fur Seals - On South Africas west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, its a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Teens, Tots and Tantrums - Its a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear - the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with natures cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Colors & Patterns - Get a front-row seat to natures most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Humpback Birth of a Giant - Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Squirrel Monkey Island - Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Edge of the Abyss - Continue the odyssey along Irelands west coast. Spy on the love affairs of grey seals in the Inishkea Islands and ply Connemaras turquoise waters. Wander in Clares magical woods and catch hundreds of basking sharks engaged in a mating display.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep38
programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finlys music performance, Archibalds unique sound leads to a hit record. But as the pressures of fame and success loom over the band, they struggle to recreate that "Archibald sound" and recapture lightning in a bottle. / When the Strutters need a family portrait, they meet a burnt out photographer named Randy. After accidentally wrecking his studio, Archibald decides hes going to help Randy rekindle his passion for photography.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep8
programme.desc: A Matter of Life and BFF / Cheer and Present Danger - After her friendship bracelet breaks, Lotta does everything she can to keep her friends. With the holidays months away the girls create their own- Friendship Appreciation Day!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.desc: A Star Is Hatched / Say Cheese - After stumbling into Finlys music performance, Archibalds unique sound leads to a hit record. programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep117
programme.desc: Twinkle Twinkle - Buttercup and Daisy find some stars in flowertot garden. They think they have fallen out of the sky and try to return them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Olivia Ep25
programme.desc: Olivia And The Family Photo - Mother is determined to take the perfect family Christmas photo in the middle of the summer. With the help of a snow machine, Olivia takes it upon herself to bring a little Christmas spirit to the photograph, and to Francine's backyard beach party next door.

programme.title: Olivia Ep26
programme.desc: Olivia Goes Camping - Francine comes along reluctantly on Olivia's family camping trip, and Olivia can't believe that anyone could be so unprepared for life in the great outdoors. But with a little hiking, bug-catching, and marshmallow roasting, Olivia is sure she can transform Francine from a novice to an expert camper.

programme.title: Olivia Ep27
programme.desc: Olivia The Nature Photographer - After snapping some great photos of her cat Edwin, Olivia thinks she's ready to photograph some real wild animals. She and Julian camp out in the backyard to wait for some, and sure enough they track down a mysterious animal in the bushes. But is it really a wild beast?

programme.title: Olivia Ep28
programme.desc: The Two Olivias - There's a new girl in Olivia's class and her name is...Olivia! Confusion ensues, and Olivia (the original Olivia) can't believe that she shares her name with another person. After a brief stint calling herself Pam, Olivia eventually decides that a two Olivia town might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep15
programme.desc: Why Porcupine Has Quills - You see there was a time when Porcupine didn't have quills, she had the softest coat in all of Tinga Tinga and Jackal wanted it. Despite warnings from all the animals Porcupine allows Jackal to invite her to his cave to keep out of the rain. Porcupine takes off her coat to allow it to dry, but while she sleeps naughty Jackal runs off with it. When she awakes Porcupine is covered in lots of tiny ant bites and they itch and they itch and they itch. Tortoise suggests Elephant squeeze some milk from the Milky Quill bush but Porcupine can't wait anymore and runs into the Quill bushes to relieve her itching. Crash! Crash! Crash! Porcupine crashes through the Quill bushes and emerges covered in spikey quills! The animals can't believe their eyes! But Porcupine is delighted as no beast will ever come near her sensitive skin ever again! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep45
programme.desc: Parental Guidance - The Trollhunters are paused from action when their parents stage an intervention to get answers from the kids.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep46
programme.desc: The Oath - The Trollhunters race to stop Gunmar from acquiring a powerful relic, and Jim must do the unthinkable to stop him!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep23
programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep23
programme.desc: Fleshbeast / Time Leafer - The Mighty Ones are terrorized by the human baby that runs amuck through the yard, but Rocksy is drawn to its power. / Everyone thinks Leaf has gotten loopy, but his theories about time travel might just be what the Mighty Ones need to return to their home.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Juliens former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Healthy Habits with JJ

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Three King's Day - It's Three Kings Day and Larimar is abuzz with holiday cheer! But when Bonnie Bones kidnaps a camel belonging to one of the Three Kings, it's up to Santiago and his crew to stop Bonnie from ruining the holiday.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep711
programme.desc: The Yucky Ducky - When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified... forever!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep710
programme.desc: The Baby Robot From Outer Space - Special Mission Blaze is on the case! When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Pups Save the Gliding Turbots / Pups Save a Plane - Francois & Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. // It's a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows - Daring Dannys at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller. // Ryder and the Pups pair up with Alex and his mini patrol to retrieve mysteriously missing items.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep119

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep101

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep525

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Treasures - Wild Alps Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia might be world famous for its outback and red deserts, but there are also lush alpine regions that are just as unique and breathtaking and play a central role to the animals living along the east coast.

programme.title: Belonging(s) - Relationships: From Tradition To True Love Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of Mary's arranged marriage in the 19th century is captured in a black and white portrait. A century later we look at the wedding accessories of Eunice, who has been happily married for more than 70 years.

programme.title: Food Safari Water - Preserved Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Explore how preserving fish creates whole new worlds of flavour in smoked salmon, bottarga, and XO sauce, plus the adventure of one of the world's great marine migrations - following the mullet run up Australia's east coast.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep14
programme.desc: The Pacific is a half hour weekly news, sport and entertainment program hosted by Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea, covering the stories that matter to the Pacific and bringing you up-to-date information from regional experts.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep170
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 4 - Hawthorn v Melbourne Ep16
programme.desc: Round 4 of the AFLW season opens with the Hawthorn Hawks hosting the defending premiers the Melbourne Demons on Friday evening.

programme.title: ABC News Ep265
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Mary Gearin (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Preliminary Final - Collingwood Magpies v GWS Giants Ep149
programme.desc: Collingwood sat on top of the ladder for most of the season and now the Magpies are one win away from the Grand Final. The Magpie Army pack the MCG for a Preliminary Final against the Giants from Greater Western Sydney.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.
